website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, comfortable, and durable. The Teva Highside 84 pays tribute to the classic '80s silhouette that will make someone reminisce about the good days of riding skateboards, cruising malls, and playing with friends. It is a retro-inspired silhouette that combines premium materials of soft suede, durable ripstop nylon and EVA footbed to provide cushioning for comfort throughout the day.
pros: A lot of buyers complemented the durability and flexibility of Teva Highside 84
Most of the reviewers are satisfied with how comfortable and breathable the shoe
According to some buyers, the shoe is suitable for regular daily wear, from casual walking to a little hiking
Many reviewers admired the modern but not flashy style of the shoe
The Teva Highside is easy to match with a variety of clothes
A lot of buyers mentioned the premium materials used in the shoe
cons: A few reviewers have mentioned that the shoe is too spacious inside that it doesn't support the feet enough
Some have said that the shoe doesn't have enough cushion and is not advisable to wear for long distances as it can be painful

customer_reviews.title: They make me happy!
customer_reviews.text: It's rare one finds the shoes they've been looking for. When I opened the box I was happy, when I put them on I was happy, when I looked down at them I was happy when I walked the dog in them I was happy, when I took them off and just looked at them I was happy. The perfect shoe in both fit and fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Stormbreath

customer_reviews.title: Teva is my go to
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these look good and hold up well, they've got great traction and tread. I use these as approach shoes (the shoes that get me to my rock climbs). My last 3 pars of shoes have been Teva because I went through 3 pairs of payless shoes before my first pair of Teva's even got close to wearing out. Overall, Teva makes good shoes from good materials that look great.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fits true.
customer_reviews.text: My first amazon review ever. These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever bought. They felt flexible and broken in immediately. Very supportive and stylish but just so comfortable. Considering buying another pair in case they stop making this shoe in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for sneaking in a bit of outdoor influence into business casual. I ordered a half size smaller than I normally wear and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Color Shoes
customer_reviews.text: We both love TEVA and their excellent quality of shoes. Husband is pleased with the fit and comfort of the shoe. Stylish too! Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: KidsnTeachin

customer_reviews.title: Sent me used shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe, but it was obviously worn before. This was a gift for my husband, so I’m pretty disappointed that I was sent used shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Esté Hupp

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right size the first time
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband for his birthday, unfortunately they were a tad big so we replaced them for a smaller size. The package was delivered but we got a bath mat instead of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Wiktorski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look and fit great! I get compliments on these shoes all time. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: tj303

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but runs large
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 9.5. This 9.5 felt more like a 10.5 or maybe a 10.
customer_reviews.author: tcvm

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a month, but so far so good. I was surprised with how comfortable and well made the shoe is. Can be worn with a variety of different clothes. Altogether, a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these. Comfy, fit as expected. I’ve had them for about 3 months now, seem like they’ll hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Takoyaki94611

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and my second pair for comfort.Comfort
customer_reviews.author: Jerome H Cassidey jr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that could be improved on is the length of the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe overall
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and flexible, has lots of grip. I use custom orthotics insoles so I can't comment on the included insoles but everything else about it is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Color not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The color was far from that shown on line. In reality it was bright green not dark olive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fits perfectly. Very high quality as one would expect from teva.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Rosa Marco

product_meta.title: Teva Men's M Highside '84 Loafer
product_meta.description: The retro-inspired shoe designed as if were straight from the 1984 Teva catalog.
feature_bullets: Built with a lightweight, adventure-ready ripstop upper inspired inspired by classic outdoor gear
Mix of leather and suede for premium style and comfort
An EVA foam footbed cushions your foot and softly supports it for all-day comfort
Rugged rubber outsole with 4mm lugs grips and supports on even the toughest terrain
